entry.title: YOLOv10: The Dual-Head OG of YOLO Series
entry.summary: YOLOv10 introduces a dual-head architecture for NMS-free training and efficiency-accuracy driven model design. It combines one-to-one and one-to-many label assignments to improve performance without extra computation. YOLOv10 uses lightweight classification heads, spatial-channel decoupled downsampling, and rank-guided blocks. entry.title: AGRaME: Any Granularity Ranking with Multi-Vector Embeddings

entry.title: Blood Cell Segmentation with Mask R-CNN

entry.title: Probabilistic Speech-Driven 3D Facial Motion Synthesis: New Benchmarks, Methods, and Applications
entry.summary: We consider the task of animating 3D facial geometry from speech signal. Existing works are primarily deterministic, focusing on learning a one-to-one mapping from speech signal to 3D face meshes on small datasets with limited speakers. While these models can achieve high-quality lip articulation for speakers in the training set, they are unable to capture the full and diverse distribution of 3D facial motions that accompany speech in the real world. Importantly, the relationship between speech and facial motion is one-to-many, containing both inter-speaker and intra-speaker variations and…

entry.title: KPConvX: Modernizing Kernel Point Convolution with Kernel Attention
entry.summary: In the field of deep point cloud understanding, KPConv is a unique architecture that uses kernel points to locate convolutional weights in space, instead of relying on Multi-Layer Perceptron (MLP) encodings. While it initially achieved success, it has since been surpassed by recent MLP networks that employ updated designs and training strategies. entry.title: Mastering Recommendation System: A Complete Guide
entry.summary: Recommendation systems (recommender systems) suggest content based on user preferences and behaviors. This guide explores their types, traditional ML techniques like matrix factorization, and advanced deep learning methods like neural collaborative filtering. Discover how these systems enhance user experiences on platforms like Netflix, Spotify, and Amazon. Mastering Recommendation System: A Complete Guide first appeared on LearnOpenCV.
